text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Public Health Minister Hedi Mhenni and his Mauritanian counterpart Mohamed Mahmoud Ould Dahmane chaired the Tunisian-Mauritanian joint health commission in Tunis.
- Organisation and modernisation of all Tunisian maritime commercial ports by end 1997.
- Qatar Emir Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa al-Thani ends a two-day official visit to Tunis.
- Tunisian embassy in Saudi Arabia to hold a seminar from June 11-12 to encourage Tunisian businessmen in the Gulf countries to invest in Tunisia.
